description: Creates an event based on a simple text string.

schema.description: OAuth 2 access token. Most APIs require `https://www.googleapis.com/auth/calendar` scope. Google Auth / Service Account Token can be used to obtain a valid access token.
API key can be generated in Google Developer Console in APIs & Services section. Leave blank if OAuth access token is used.
Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.
Calendar identifier. To retrieve calendar IDs call the calendarList.list method. If you want to access the primary calendar of the currently logged in user, use the "primary" keyword.
The text describing the event to be created.
Guests who should receive notifications about the creation of the new event.
